name: Global X Long-Term U.S. Treasury Premium Yield ETF
longDescription: The Fund investment objective, LPAY.U will generally invest, directly or indirectly, in a portfolio of U.S. Treasury securities denominated in U.S. dollars. The Manager will generally endeavor to maintain a target duration of over ten years for LPAY.U, within a certain band, by employing rules-based security selection methodology and weighting. Currently, it is anticipated that LPAY.U will seek to achieve its investment objective by investing in index funds and money market funds The Fund seeks to provide exposure to the performance of a portfolio of U.S. Treasury securities, generally targeting a duration over 1 years and high monthly distributions of interest income and option premiums.
